textAfterTable: 12 Songs Customer Reviews Sounds From Around The World           by Namnaste I loev Thievory Corporation, Air, Gorillaz, The Good The Bad The Queen and Antibalas, and I have now fallen inlove with the sounds of temple of sound as well. Biography Genre: World Years Active: '00s Led by a pair of multi-instrumentalists, Neil Sparkes and Count Dubulah, Temple of Sound mixes exotic world music sounds with modern day dance beats. Both members got their start as part of the U.K. dance outfit Transglobal Underground in the early '90s (specifically their 1993 debut, Dream of 100 Nations and 1994's International Times). By 1996, Sparkes and Dubulah decided to branch out on their own, leading to the formation of Temple of Sound. The duo recruited drummer Terry Neale, vocalist Diva...
